pages.text: Wiltum Trees grow in abundance in the Dead Valley biome and can be grown by you from saplings, including wide species of trees from 4 adjacent saplings. These trees are made from Wiltum Wood, which can be stripped or recycled into a variety of other decorative and functional blocks.
Wiltum Core is found at the top of a tree behind its foliage and can be processed into wood or used as decorative lighting.
